original_text: And you murmured in your tents and said, ‘Because the Lord hated us he has brought us out of the land of Egypt, to give us into the hand of the Amorites, to destroy us.
korean_text: 장막 중에서 원망하여 이르기를 여호와께서 우리를 미워하시므로 아모리 족속의 손에 넘겨 멸하시려고 우리를 애굽 땅에서 인도하여 내셨도다

sentences.original_text: And you murmured in your tents
he has brought us out of the land of Egypt,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 우리를 애굽 땅에서 이끌어 내셨다,

sentences.original_text: to give us into the hand of the Amorites,
